topic.title: OMG I just exploded a full bottle of wine !!!
topic.body:
carnage ! rampage, blood bath !! and just a bottle full... short story... the cork was stuck. I used maximum pressure tactic. sadly the bottle, from my hand in a ultimate push, ricochted on the kitchen countertop... the bottom of the bottle had a sudden loss of integrity. sadly, gravity won, and all flown... 

It was a mess ! but I loved it. after cleaning, next bottle up!  more care, already drunk ! time for a liquor ! more power ! jet fuel :).

it's called disintermediation.

dear styromaniac,
We are in a state of war for the survival of Mankind. let's review your arguments :

2. a counter coup, aka indenpendence war 2, isn't terrorism, it's our NATURAL BIRTH RIGHT as written in the INDEPENDENCE DECLARATION. so no, next.

1614910002_1Nz5xXKiiTFGd6big5zcBnaGVH3hU.body: shit bags from the WHO... nothing else.

1615234594_1HJKoK5icacs175hMpyE5AQDozvmQ.body: I was still holding the bottomless emptied bottle. All good - all clear - only wine ! moar !

No, I had only 2 left of those bottle... 1 is gone... the problem was the corkscrew... it's a cheap one in plastic. And for old bottle, with dry corks it doesn't go far enough, so I forced it a little... meaning that my grip was weak to try to remove the cork. I used the said strategy... but as the my pull force was yuge, there was a reboud... the counter was hard... the sudden loss of integrity and fluid was interesting... fluid blood bath ! 

it's the cleaning that's less funny :).

yeah weak bag... specially when the bottle is colder than the ambiant air with condensation... treasonous, even with hands... :). and it slipped.
